definition: to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
twenty (20), in a limited number of set expressions/also written using banker's character 念
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to abstain from voting/to forfeit/to waive one's right to vote/to abdicate
to waste all one's previous efforts (idiom)/all that has been achieved goes down the drain
to abandon oneself to despair/to give up and stop bothering

sentences.english: When you play Phantasmagorian, any player may discard three cards. If a player does, counter Phantasmagorian.
sentences.chinese: 當你使用驚怖幻象時，任意玩家可以棄三張牌。

sentences.english: The only time you run out of chances is when you stop taking them.
sentences.chinese: 當你停止捕捉機會時，機會棄你而去。

sentences.english: Why is Mr Obama abandoning one of his central election pledges?
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬何以棄競選時的重要承諾於不顧？

sentences.english: The site also reports that her lawyers have officially dropped her as a client.
sentences.chinese: 消息網還報道說她的律師已經棄她而去。

sentences.english: Give up little minds of swallows, and hold high aspirations of swans .
sentences.chinese: 棄燕雀之小志，慕鴻鵠而高翔。

sentences.english: Boynton said. Instead he might just walk away.
sentences.chinese: 他有可能就因此棄你而去了。

sentences.english: Although is rain, throw not away thy watering pot.
sentences.chinese: 老天雖下雨，噴壺不成棄。

sentences.english: Why you give up the jade instead of the kid?
sentences.chinese: 你到底是怎麼想的，棄玉石而就孩子呢？

sentences.english: ON THE edge of Hanoi brick-walled factories lie abandoned, weeds sprouting in their ruins.
sentences.chinese: 在河內的廃棄圍牆工廠邊緣，野草在廢墟中萌芽。

sentences.english: Think I’d leave you down when you’re down on your knees?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲我會棄你於無力自持時嗎？

definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
to select/to choose/to pick over/to pick out/to differentiate/to eliminate/also pr. [zhai2]
